A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really don't understand the negative reaction on here\, this entry in to the franchise was the most refreshing since Revenge of the Sith. Many running plot lines with unexpected twists. Some good lessons that you typically don't get out of Star Wars. A more subdued and less optimistic movie with awesome combat scenes. There is some off parts\, but considering where we left off in TFA I'm really pleased. It is unconventional\, conflicted\, and darker than I was expecting.
